comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: Frank Baker was also known as Home Run Baker.  He led the league one year.  He hit something like 7, LOL.  But, that was in the dead ball era.  The ball was not wound tight and players chopped at the ball more, facing the pitcher more with their body turned more toward the mound.
